title: Only Clock available as screensaver
content:
When I select ScreenSaver I only see the option "Clock"
Missing Options:
Colours: See changing colours on your screen.
Photos: See photos from the Photos app. To choose your source or change the settings, next to 'Photos', tap Settings .

How to enable/activate Colours /Photos as screensaver?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
